answers.answer: Yeah.. apparently it used to be a syrupy thick drink that tasted like butt.The one I got, almost tasted like cold children's liquid motrin, or flat orange soda.  Not bad at all.

question: Im at the appointment waiting for the hour to go by and the drink wasn't that bad..I was dreading it cause everyone says its gross and they throw up and stuff. anyone else feel the same? Lol
title: gestational diabetes test
